Package utilities

Class MapValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.MapValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class MapValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates the main graph of countries and subgraphs of continents. It also validates the input map file
    Author:
    apoorvasharma version 1.0.0
    See Also:
